Summary: Semi-oblong with many flashing lights , rotating possibly.
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around April 28th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI just looked at the sky while having a cigarette , it appeared to be above Kansas City , missouri .At first it appeared to be a star .We went for binnoculars and looked at it and it was like a donut of lights through the binnoculars. It was hovering but too high for a helicopter and not moving like a plane .... it went northward after about 30 minutes . It was as if it were standing above the city - when it moved it was slow to the north . I stopped looking to call local PD which must have thought I was crazy and said look up aviation or something .... We all looked at it , no one had a good answer of what kind of craft it was . It disappeared from where we could see due to trees . But it was a neat experience .
